goal: Detect artifacts with the same name but different signatures (arguments, return types) across the system
description: This is Task 129 in GitHub issue #86 (Architectural Coherence Validator). The check finds artifacts with the same name in the system, then compares their signatures to detect conflicts where the same function/method has different parameters or return types. Returns CoherenceIssue with IssueType.SIGNATURE_CONFLICT for any conflicts found.

contains.name: check_signature_conflicts
contains.description: Main function that checks for signature conflicts. Returns list of CoherenceIssue with IssueType.SIGNATURE_CONFLICT for any conflicts found.

contains.name: _extract_artifact_signature
contains.description: Extract a signature string from an artifact. Combines args and returns into a signature like "(arg1: str, arg2: int) -> bool".

contains.name: _compare_signatures
contains.description: Compare two signatures for compatibility. Returns True if signatures match/compatible, False if conflict.
